doc:
George Douglas (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Douglas_(actor) 0 George Douglas (George Lamar Hesselberg: August 7, 1903 in Macon, Georgia – June 11, 1983) was an American actor. He was born as the younger brother of the actor Melvyn Douglas. Their mother was Lena Priscilla (née Shackelford) and their father Edouard Gregory Hesselberg, a concert pianist and composer. His father was a Jewish immigrant from Riga, Latvia. His mother, a native of Tennessee, was Protestant and a Mayflower descendant. His maternal grandfather, George Shackelford, was a general and Civil War veteran.He died in San Diego, California, United States, in June 1983. George_Douglas ( George_Lamar_Hesselberg : August_7_,_1903 in Macon , Georgia – June_11_,_1983 ) was an_American_actor . He was_born as the_younger_brother of the_actor_Melvyn_Douglas . Their_mother was Lena_Priscilla_(_née_Shackelford_) and their_father_Edouard_Gregory_Hesselberg , a_concert_pianist_and_composer . His_father was a_Jewish_immigrant from Riga , Latvia . His_mother , a_native of Tennessee , was Protestant and a_Mayflower_descendant . His_maternal_grandfather , George_Shackelford , was a_general_and_Civil_War_veteran.He died in San_Diego , California , United_States , in June_1983 .
